title: 10. IF IT IS TOO DIFFICULT TO ASSESS THE EFFECTS ON THE ECONOMY AND OTHER INDIRECT ADVERSE EFFECTS, WHEN SHOULD WE AT LEAST BE ABLE TO DETERMINE THE REAL DANGER OF THE VIRUS?
